Banner.Description: I have 1 year of experience developing APIs, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Next.js, React.js and in Node.js applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1 year as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked in making Web Apps , optimizing codes, and covering backend developer roles with Node.js, MongoDb and Mysql. I have worked in teams and have experience in co-operating with teammates.
My skills also include implementing APIs, optimizing sites and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on FullStack and backend.
Made Reusable Reastful APIs in Company's live projects
Worked on NextJs in company's live projects
Creation and maintenance of an OpenAI RAG based website Done in Nextjs, Nodejs, MongoDB, Tailwind.
Creating platforms with NextJs, ReactJs, NodeJs, ExpressJS.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend developer
Description: Made Reusable Reastful APIs in Company's live projects
Learned Web3 Js as well because mostly projects are related to blockchain

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack developer trainee
Description: Through my training, I have honed my skills in designing and developing responsive web applications.
As a MERN Stack trainee, i have gained a strong foundation in front-end and back-end web development using Javascript, React, Node.js and MongoDB.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
